column1: #Text=Aang says : " You had to pick up the glowing egg , did n't you ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " At least I made something happen .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Who are you yelling to ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , what do you think we should do ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Think about our place in the universe ?
